column2:
<!-- rnb-source-begin  -->

```r
dummy <- ifelse(soi < 0, 0, 1) # for the piecewise regression

fish <- ts.intersect(rec, soiL6 = stats::lag(soi,-6), dL6 = stats::lag(dummy,-6), dframe = TRUE)
fit <- lm(rec~ soiL6 * dL6, data = fish, na.action = NULL)
```

<!-- rnb-source-end -->

```r
dummy <- ifelse(soi < 0, 0, 1) # for the piecewise regression

fish <- ts.intersect(rec, soiL6 = stats::lag(soi,-6), dL6 = stats::lag(dummy,-6), dframe = TRUE)
fit <- lm(rec~ soiL6 * dL6, data = fish, na.action = NULL)
```
